actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to include voucher or scrip payments to general recipients in qualified general assistance programs.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include in the definition of "qualified general assistance program" voucher and scrip payments, for purposes of the targeted jobs income tax credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to include voucher or scrip payments to general recipients in qualified general assistance programs.
